type.description: Button type, optional value is `default` `primary` `success` `warning` danger
type.description_zh: 按钮类型，可选值为 `default` `primary` `success` `warning` danger

color.description_zh: 按钮颜色，支持传入 `linear-gradient` 渐变色

icon.description: The icon name or picture link on the left is equivalent to the [name attribute] of the Icon component.(https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/zh-CN/icon%23props)
icon.description_zh: 左侧图标名称或图片链接，等同于 Icon 组件的 [name 属性](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/zh-CN/icon%23props)

loading.description: Whether it is displayed as loading

url.description: Click and jump to the link address
url.description_zh: 点击后跳转的链接地址

to.description: The target routing object that jumps after clicking is equivalent to the [to property] of Vue Router.(https://router.vuejs.org/zh/api/interfaces/RouterLinkProps.html#Properties-to)
to.description_zh: 点击后跳转的目标路由对象，等同于 Vue Router 的 [to 属性](https://router.vuejs.org/zh/api/interfaces/RouterLinkProps.html#Properties-to)

replace.description: Whether to replace the current page history when jumping
replace.description_zh: 是否在跳转时替换当前页面历史
